game.title: Alien Invasion: The Last Stand
game.synopsis:
The game story synopsis:
  - Post-apocalyptic world ravaged by alien invasion
  - Protagonist, a lone warrior, discovers prophecy about an artifact
  - Mysterious artifact to save humanity from impending doom
  - Battles and hidden secrets
  - Eradicating alien forces and humanity's rebirth
game.beginning: The game begins in a post-apocalyptic world...
game.ending: ...with the protagonist's final victory and salvation of Earth
